PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE DAVID C. HARRIS to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia.
